author: Don Watkins
comment: It would install to the watch but does not function.   Doesn't do anything

reply.author: Arwer Software
reply.content: The new v2.0 version has been released, and has been better adapted to new systems and devices; In addition, in the "FAQ" on the main menu of the new application, some of the problems with installation and use have been helped.

title: Nope
